onboarding-call-dialog.title: Want to read a step-by-step guide to the DUST PLATFORM?

portfolio.title: “Portfolio” section
portfolio.description: In this section you can create your portfolios and track your assets and investments.

list.1: The total estimated balance of portfolios and PNL
list.3: The integration of an exchange portfolios in a single place
list.4: The estimation and tracking of venture investments

virtual_portfolio.title: The virtual portfolio
virtual_portfolio.description: You can add your assets manually and simulate different types of investment strategies with this portfolio.

list.4: Pie Сhart visualization of the distribution of finances

exchange_portfolio.title: Exchange portfolio
exchange_portfolio.description: With this portfolio, you can track your exchange portfolios using API integrations.

list.1: The simple and clear integration, using API
list.2: The automatic update of transactions and prices
list.4: Pie Сhart visualization of the distribution of finances

venture_portfolio.title: The venture portfolio
venture_portfolio.description: With this portfolio, you can track all venture investments with flexible configuration and visualizations.

list.1: The flexible tracking of venture investments
list.2: The chart of TGE and unlocks
list.3: The detailed information about a venture asset
list.4: Automatic calculations instead of Excel tables

forum.title: “Forum” section
forum.description: In this section you can create posts and share your thoughts with a community of like-minded people.

list.1: The viewing posts in a rating order
list.2: The ability to comment on posts created by other people
list.3: Earning DUST Token for best posts
list.4: Staying up-to-date on the latest events

academy.title: “Academy” section
academy.description: In this section, you can choose the course you are interested in and get new knowledge.

list.1: Every course is created by DUST FOUNDATION team
list.2: The videos contain the visual representation of complex topics.
list.3: The final rating in each module
list.4: The evaluation of modules and courses

balance.title: “Top up balance” section
balance.description: In this section you can purchase/extend subscriptions for platform and crypto-community.

list.2: The support of different networks and Binance Pay
list.3: The detailed video tutorial on how to make payments for newcomers
list.4: Quick crediting funds to the platform

subscription.title: “Subscription” section
subscription.description: In this section you can choose and activate different types of subscriptions.

list.2: 3 types of subscription with different durations
list.4: Discount system and earning of DUST Token

profile.title: “Profile” section
profile.description: In this section you can get daily rewards, achievements, and track your rating.

list.2: Daily rewards for visiting a platform
